name: onboarding-tool
description: Root package for the Onboarding Tool project

scripts.start:backend: concurrently "npm start --prefix backend/api-gateway" "npm start --prefix backend/services/user-service" "npm start --prefix backend/services/onboarding-service" "npm start --prefix backend/services/notification-service" "npm start --prefix backend/services/template-service" "npm start --prefix backend/services/integration-service" "npm start --prefix backend/services/analytics-service"
